title: Store Error
body: I was working all day during Day 13 of Worlds(Semi-finals) and when I came home that night to buy the Champion Jewel Token -Day 13, I couldn't buy it because of the errors occurring. Is there anyway to earn it? :(

replies.body:
D:

We may be able to help out if you hit us up in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) Let me know if you have any other questions.
